meanings.definition: The act of commuting to work or school in a vanpool.
meanings.sent1: Many employees participate in vanpoolings to save money on gas.
meanings.sent2: We organized a vanpoolings to ensure everyone arrived at the office on time.
meanings.sent3: The vanpoolings to the university was like a mini adventure every morning.
meanings.sent4: The vanpoolings transformed the daily commute into a shared journey of camaraderie.
meanings.sent5: The concept of vanpoolings made the morning routine more efficient and enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The practice of sharing a van for transportation to a common destination.
meanings.sent1: Our neighborhood implemented vanpoolings to reduce traffic congestion.
meanings.sent2: The vanpoolings to the concert venue was a fun way to travel together.
meanings.sent3: Sharing snacks during the vanpoolings always brought a sense of community.
meanings.sent4: The vanpoolings symbolized unity and cooperation among the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of vanpoolings made the daily commute stress-free and eco-friendly.
